sources.title: Smart Alecks (1942)
sources.description: Danny helps to capture a wanted criminal and receives a $200 reward. However, he has a falling out with the gang when they believe he should share the money with them. Complications ensue when the crook that Danny helped capture escapes from jail and comes looking for him. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/smart-alecks-1942/

sources.title: Smart Alecks (1942) THE EAST SIDE KIDS
sources.description:
Stars: Leo Gorcey, Bobby Jordan, Huntz Hall
Director: Wallace Fox

Danny helps to capture a wanted criminal and receives a $200 reward. However, he has a falling out with the gang when they believe he should share the money with them. Complications ensue when the crook that Danny helped capture escapes from jail and comes looking for him.

sources.title: Smart Alecks (1942) Comedy, Crime, Drama Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Danny helps to capture a wanted criminal and receives a $200 reward. However, he has a falling out with the gang when they believe he should share the money with them. Complications ensue when the crook that Danny helped capture escapes from jail and comes looking for him. 

Director: Wallace Fox
Writers: Harvey Gates
Stars: Leo Gorcey (as Muggs McGinnis) Stanley Clements (as Stash), Huntz Hall (as Glimpy), Bobby Stone (as Skinny), Ernest Morrison (as Scruno), David Gorcey (as Peewee)
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Crime, Drama
